title: [Old Ta'Faendryl, North]
description: A large, flat slab of rock rises from the soil, rectangular in shape and smooth on the top, undeniably shaped by the tools of man.  Loose soil piled around the base suggests that one or more burrowing creatures has made themselves a cozy home beneath the stony shelter.
paths: Obvious paths: east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest
